content:
TITLE: Initializing WorkOS CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize the WorkOS CLI, which prompts for configuration settings for the specified environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
workos init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: WorkOS CLI Configuration File Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of a .workos.json configuration file containing environment settings for the WorkOS CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "environments": {
    "local": {
      "endpoint": "http://localhost:8001",
      "apiKey": "<YOUR_KEY>",
      "type": "Sandbox",
      "name": "local"
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing WorkOS CLI via Homebrew on MacOS
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the WorkOS CLI using Homebrew package manager on MacOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
brew install workos/tap/workos-cli
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding a New Environment to WorkOS CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to add a new environment configuration to the WorkOS CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
workos env add
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generic WorkOS CLI Command Usage
DESCRIPTION: Generic syntax for running WorkOS CLI commands with arguments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
workos [cmd] [args]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Switching Between WorkOS CLI Environments
DESCRIPTION: Command to switch between configured environments in the WorkOS CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
workos env switch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring WorkOS CLI in Headless Mode
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting environment variables for configuring WorkOS CLI in headless mode, overriding environment configs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
export WORKOS_ACTIVE_ENVIRONMENT=headless
export WORKOS_ENVIRONMENTS_HEADLESS_NAME=local
export WORKOS_ENVIRONMENTS_HEADLESS_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8001
export WORKOS_ENVIRONMENTS_HEADLESS_API_KEY=<YOUR_KEY>
export WORKOS_ENVIRONMENTS_HEADLESS_TYPE=Sandbox
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Active Environment for WorkOS CLI
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the active environment for WorkOS CLI using an environment variable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
export WORKOS_ACTIVE_ENVIRONMENT=local
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing an Environment from WorkOS CLI
DESCRIPTION: Command to remove a configured environment from the WorkOS CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
workos env remove
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Upgrading WorkOS CLI via Homebrew on MacOS
DESCRIPTION: Command to upgrade the WorkOS CLI to the latest version using Homebrew package manager on MacOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/workos/workos-cli/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
brew upgrade workos/tap/workos-cli
```
